channel.title: Electricity on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in Electricity on Joost Plattel

item.title: Learning about power-usage data from my home
item.description: I recently moved to a new home, and I got a freshly installed new electricity meter that's a little bit more intelligent. It was now possible for me to sign up for slimmemeterportal.nl, that let's you access the power-usage data from the meter by a 15 minute window.Â That's quite some data to play with! Being interested in the data, I wrote a little scraper that collects it for me and stores it in a SQL database, from there on, with Flask and Peewee it was quite simple to create a little API for my own dataset.
